text: A boy with a cookie in his one hand and his hand in the cookie jar, standing on a stool . which is tipping over. Little girl's got her hand up for one and I don't know what the hand means to the mouth. Does it mean she wants to eat? The kitchen sink is running over, the water is running out, it's on the floor. The mother is trying the dishes, frowning but not turning off the faucet. long silence Two cups on the counter. . Plate. .. The lid is falling off the open door. . The lid is falling off as quickly as you want. . I want to see if I can get the cupboard's half
